resources.string: Take turns with the computer rolling any number of dice up to 25.
If a player rolls a 1 with one of the dice, that player\'s score is zero for the round.
A player wins when they reach a score of 100.
Gettysburg College Professor Todd W. Neller designed the AI for computer players.

Amrit Dhakal is a Computer Science Major at Gettysburg College in the graduating class of 2017. His contributions to Hog Game included design and implementation of the user interface, implementation of dice animation and implementaiton of credits page.
